content: Take the previous responses and combine them into a full story with an introduction of all the characters (Natalia, Ashley, Jack, Michael, Cindy, and Steve) at the camp grounds, the point where the ghost is introduced and begins haunting the characters, the point where the characters almost die at the rope bridge, and then leading to the point where they escape the ghost and the campgrounds all together. Word count has to be around 1000 words and try to create suspense between encounters with the ghost
